Description: Thank you for visiting our ebay store! This classic and sophisticated reproduction style pocket watch from Gotham is the perfect addiition to anyone's timepiece collections. Features include a highly polished round gold-tone brass case with built in stand, white textured dial with applied silver-tone Roman numerals and open center to expose the intricate 17 jewel mechanical movement and scratch resistant mineral crystals, front and back. Additional features include bold blue cobalt hands, a 15 inch curb chain that can attach to your belt loop plus a bonus solid brass desktop stand to display your timepiece proudly when not worn. As always, your watch will arrive beautifully gift packaged and include operating instructions, lifetime limited warranty and a Selvyt polishing cloth to keep your watch clean. This is truly a beautiful watch at a great price. Enjoy. - Classic and elegant gold-tone 17 jewel mechanical open face exhibition pocket watch with Roman numeral dial - Beautiful exhibition case back showing all moving parts - Rich antique style blue cobalt hour, minute and seconds hands plus scratch resistant mineral crystal - Includes matching 15" curb pocket watch chain with spring ring attachment plus solid brass desk top stand - Arrives in beautiful presentation box with Selvyt polishing cloth, lifetime limited warranty and operating instructions Gotham Men's Gold-Tone Mechanical Pocket Watch with Desktop Stand # GWC14055G-ST
